tasks.task: Purchasing and setting up a drip irrigation system
subtasks: Researching drip irrigation systems online
Navigating to sprinklerwarehouse.com
Adding a drip system to the shopping cart
Completing the purchase for the drip system
Locating the appropriate area in the garden for the system
Preparing the soil by tilling or loosening the dirt
Digging trenches for the drip lines at the correct depth
Attaching emitters or drippers to the main line according to plant spacing
Connecting the drip lines to a water source and installing valves
Covering the laid drip lines with mulch or soil to conceal them
Checking the system's functionality by running it and observing water distribution
Regularly inspecting the system for leaks or clogs
Cleaning filters and replacing parts as necessary
Adjusting the system's schedule based on weather and plant needs
